review: Great for what I needed it for
author: Travis

review: Over all happy with this, I like it better than  our  chrome, but could use some tweaking ,  should  be able  to browse shopping  through it, that would  be nice. Video  feed was shaky  at first ,  would  say  lost Internet  connection ,  when  it was fine, the longer  we use it the more consistent  it is.
author: cassie Kinney

review: I LOVE my fire stick! I bought it at a VERY reasonable price and I am able to watch Netflix so easily! It really comes in handy when no kid shows are on Cable and you need to ocupy your nephews! Definitely recommend to everyone!!
author: Caitlin LaFountain

review: My 13 year old son loves it. He was upset with us for canceling DirecTV but very pleased with this streaming device. We already pay for Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime, so really he is not missing anything in his bedroom. Bonus for him was YouTube, once he saw that he was hooked.
author: Tad Waddell

review: Disappointed that it doesn't support HBO Now.
author: Vicki

review: Love it, but wish it did not have to be plugged in!
author: FlatLover

review: Very easy to set up  Accesses  a ton of content
author: Amazon Customer

review: Awesome!! Meets and exceeds the expectations.
author: Jason H.
